Double Punch/Manterror/Injector:

Double Punch, at the scanners, saw gunfire hitting the ship.  Seeing Suukie 
on a screen he slammed a pincher on the ground.  <Lord Hell Beast, the 
Maximal's "allies" are attacking us.  They've tricked us!  Return quickly!>  
Pressing a few buttons, all klaxons began to flash red, base defenses came 
online and opened fire on Suukie.  The intercom blared with Double Punch's 
steady voice.  ~All Predacons, this is Double Punch.  For now, I'm in command 
until someone of higher rank relieves me.  We are under attack by the 
Maximals!  All forces are to take battle stations, and counter assault the 
enemy forces.  So far it just looks like a scouting party, but more are 
obviously on the way!  SO MOVE IT!!!~

(I hope no one minds me doing this, on the Predacon's side that is)

Injector jumped, having been in his quarters.  "Maximals, hehe.  Time for 
them to feel my sting!" he said, taking out his stinger missile launcher, 
heading for a hatch.

-----

Manterror in the engine doing routine check ups, hearing the intercon slammed 
his foot on the ground.  Pressing a few buttons, he set up a network of extra 
energy just in case the shields or weapons went down, he then headed for a 
hatch, banging on people's quarters and yelling brief explanations and 
telling them to "Get the slag up!".
